thread.title: A Message From The Other Kevin McCarthy
thread.title_full: A Message From The Other Kevin McCarthy

author: Susie Madrak
title: A Message From The Other Kevin McCarthy
text:
sharethis 10/07/15 1:00pm 
Imagine being @KevinMcCarthy on Twitter -- no, not that Kevin McCarthy. That Kevin McCarthy is a Republican and possibly the next Speaker of the House. This Kevin McCarthy is a Hillary Clinton supporter from Iowa, and he's getting messages that look like this: . @GOP Abandons @GOPLeader on #Benghazi Comments http://t.co/yBI5h98op0 I already don't like this prick @KevinMcCarthy . Another empty suit. 
â€” Jett Davis (@TheJettDavis) October 2, 2015 Oh my god! @KevinMcCarthy is illiterate or has brain damage or is mentally retarded!?!? His speech is nonsensical!! #WhoElectedHim ?? #Maddow
